entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is exhausted but delighted with his night's work and shares it with Ron and Hermione in the next morning's Charms lesson.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who is impressed by Harry's accomplishments and wand movements.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's other friend who is also impressed by Harry's accomplishments and helps Ron to stop making it snow.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is a teacher at Hogwarts who had given Harry information about Voldemort's Horcruxes.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story and has Horcruxes that need to be destroyed.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a teacher at Hogwarts who promises to take Harry along if he finds another Horcrux.
